full_summary:
Janitorial Services at National Hydrology Research Centre and Prairie Northern Wildlife Research Centre
=====================================

### Solicitation Details

*   Solicitation Number: 5000068924
*   Title: Janitorial Services at National Hydrology Research Centre and Prairie Northern Wildlife Research Centre
*   Publication Date: 2023-03-03
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-03 17:00:00

### Description

The successful bidder shall provide all materials, cleaning supplies, equipment, labor, and supervision necessary to provide custodial services for Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) at the National Hydrology Research Centre (NHRC) and Prairie Northern Wildlife Research Centre (PNWRC) in Saskatoon, SK.

### Key Contract Terms and Conditions

*   The contractor shall adhere to all applicable regulatory codes and regulations, including occupational health and safety policies.
*   The contractor shall provide documented proof of WHMIS training for all contract staff.
*   The contractor shall provide Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for all work tasks to be performed by staff working on-site.
*   The contractor shall ensure that all staff working on-site have fluency in English for verbal, written, and electronic communication.
*   The contractor shall provide site-specific SOPs and job descriptions.
*   The contractor shall ensure compliance with all relevant policies and procedures of ECCC.

### Technical Requirements

*   The successful bidder shall provide a minimum of one full-time day shift cleaner, one full-time evening shift cleaner at each location, and two cleaning staff members per building for evening shifts.
*   The contractor shall provide standby cleaning staff in the event of scheduled or approved late-night or weekend closures.

### Administrative and Contractual Information

*   The bidder must confirm their attendance and the name of the representative who will attend the on-site visit by contacting Heidi.Noble@ec.gc.ca no later than March 13, 2023 at 10:00 AM.

### Notice and Physical Address of Contracting Authority

The contracting authority can be reached at:

[Heidi.Noble@ec.gc.ca](mailto:Heidi.Noble@ec.gc.ca).
